projects.title: AuthMaster
projects.description: A secure login system built with Python's Tkinter library featuring sign-up, sign-in, and SHA-256 password hashing capabilities.

projects.title: LMS
projects.description: A Library Management System implemented in C++ using doubly linked lists for efficient book record management with sorting and searching capabilities.

projects.title: Qt-Cascade-app
projects.description: A desktop object detection application built with Qt and OpenCV using Haar cascade classifiers for real-time computer vision tasks.

projects.title: Cat-Dog Classifier
projects.description: A PySide6 application using TensorFlow for image classification, featuring a customizable model to distinguish between cats and dogs.

projects.title: EVER 5th Generation
projects.description: An AI-powered autonomous truck system combining machine learning, PID controllers, and computer vision for intelligent lane changes.

projects.title: Numerical Analysis Project
projects.description: A Linux-optimized C++17 application implementing numerical analysis algorithms with Qt6 GUI for root finding and curve fitting.
